text:
[Verse]
Lights flash neon signs
Walking streets so fine
Lost in concrete maze
Nights blend into days

[Verse 2]
Crowds move I stand still
Heart beats feel the thrill
Dreams rise high they soar
Push past every door

[Chorus]
Lost in the city lights
Shining so
Oh so bright
Finding my way tonight
Lost in the city lights

[Verse 3]
Music in the air
Buzzing everywhere
Chaos in the night
Guides me to the light

[Bridge]
Skyscrapers touch the sky
Questions passing by
Searching for a clue
With a city view

[Chorus]
Lost in the city lights
Shining so
Oh so bright
Finding my way tonight
Lost in the city lights
title: Lost in the City
